title: Mitered Shower Niche Tip

author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tub shower tile tips…I use a contour gauge to get the tub outline. The Pica Dry Wet Jet pencil inserts are also helpful. They don’t wash off when exposed to water. Also, if the tile chips I use 200 or 400 grit electroplated polishing pads. These are great and make any imperfections smooth 🔥#tile #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor
title: Tub Shower Tile Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
